Text: Re New Risk Management BookThanks so much Pedro Fernando Vince J CT PM To Shirley CT cc Pedro Fernando ManriqueENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Vince J CT Subject Re New Risk Management Book Shirley Please send a copy of the book to Pedro Fernando Vince Pedro Fernando NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Vince J CT cc Subject New Risk Management Book Vince In Colombia we are setting up a trading operation and would be nice to have a copy of the new book for our reference Please let us know how we can get access to a copy Many thanks Pedro Fernando

HelloHi Scott I just wanted to let you know that have been in Houston for a while since the office in Bogota closed down at the end of last year I am currently working in the DSM Desk in EES and I would definitely like to speak to you whenever you have some time Please let me know when would be a good time for you Best regards Pedro Fernando
